structure.unit: CLASSIFICATION AND DESIGNATION OF OFFENSES -- AUTHORIZED DISPOSITION

text.section: Any offense defined outside this code for which a law outside this code provides a sentence to a definite term of imprisonment with a maximum which falls between ninety (90) days and twelve (12) months shall be deemed a Class A misdemeanor.

Any offense defined outside this code for which a law outside this code provides a sentence to a definite term of imprisonment with a maximum of less than ninety (90) days shall be deemed a Class B misdemeanor.

Any offense defined outside this code for which a law outside this code provides a sentence to a fine only or to any other punishment, whether in combination with a fine or not, other than death or imprisonment shall be deemed a violation.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 74, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 309, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 2, effective December 22, 1976. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 274, effective January 1, 1975.
